item.title: Guaranteed weight loss and Fitness with lifestyle changes
item.description: Across the globe many people are suffering from overweight and obesity. The longer the obesity persists, the higher the risks Overweight people are 2-6 times more likely to develop hypertension, increased risk for stroke, deep vein thrombosis, impaired cardiac function, high blood triglycerides, low HDL, insulin resistance and type 2 diabetes Obesity can be a risk factor for development of cancer. Obese people are more likely to have degenerative joint disease, sleep apnea and mechanical breathing constraints.

item.title: Home Workout Habits in 10 Min - Fitness for Busy-Lazy People
item.description: Fitness - The 10 Minutes or Less Home Workout Habit for Lazy People You Can Improve Fitness, Muscle Building, Fat Loss and Weight Loss by Doing a Simple and Short Home Workout Daily If you’re not ready to sign up for the next Iron Man competition but you are ready to get in better shape, in as little time as possible, then this course is for you. You do not have to spend hours a day working out just to maintain proper fitness.

item.title: How to create a profitable online fitness bootcamp
item.description: You will learn how to create a profitable online fitness bootcamp geared for all levels. You will learn everything about how to set up your bootcamp from lighting to music , to program design and marketing. This course will provide you with the knowledge to be able to start your very own brand in the most cost efficient way. The course will walk you through the steps and give you the confidence to be able operate your own business.

item.title: TAbs от школы похудения Активно Хорошеем
item.description: ТАБС (от слияния английских слов Tabata и Abs) - это уникальная серия обучающих высоко интенсивных интервальных видео-тренировок построенных по типу Табата с акцентом на талию и пресс. Такой тип тренировок более эффективен, по сравнению с обычными тренировками, так как процесс жиросжигания происходит не только во время тренировки, но и продолжается после тренировки. Курс состоит из 3х полноценных домашних тренировок по 30 минут, включающих в себя и разминку и отдых между подходами и заминку после тренировки, так что вам не нужно ничего дополнительно придумывать.

item.title: Functional Fitness Training – Easy Way To Get Shape At Home
item.description: In this online functional fitness course you will learn how to get in shape gently, without killing yourself. This functional fitness course will be your guide, teaching you simple ways to feel and look better than you have in years without grunting, sweating and straining. If you want to get in shape, but don’t want to be a gym rat, this is the perfect fitness course for you. This functional fitness course teaches you how to tone stretch muscles to give yourself the shape, strength, balance and movement of somebody years younger.

item.title: Kettlebell Fitness Training – Easy Way To Maximum Fitness
item.description: In this online kettlebell Fitness video training course you will learn how tone up & burn fat the way the top pros teach it. Consider this video course to be your “Personal Trainer” guiding you to the most effective methods for fat burning, muscle building, toning and strength. Kettlebell Fitness training has 5 main benefits: 1) Tones the muscles & problem areas 2) Greatly improves strength & endurance 3) Can help you build muscle 4) Improves balance & stability 5) Hits muscles other exercises miss!

item.title: Muscle Building - How To Workout For Increasing Muscle Mass
item.description: In This Muscle Building Course You Will Learn How The Pros Teach People How To Pack On Muscle Fast. This Course Is Not Medical Advice ... But Is Based On Scientific Research & Principles That Are Known To Get Results Fast! Having These Tools & Strategies Will Make Gaining Muscle So Much Easier, Dramatically Increasing The Results You Get & Helping You Achieve Your Goals In Less Time. In This Online Muscle Building Course For Men & Women You Will Learn How To Build Muscle And Strength The Way The Top Pros Teach It.

item.title: The Complete Fitness & Health Masterclass - 21 Courses in 1
item.description: If You Only Buy ONE Course This Year … It GOT To Be This One! With over 22 hours of video content, downloadable resources and bonuses - this is one of the most comprehensive fitness & health masterclass available! You'll also get access to: Lifetime Access to course updates Fast & Friendly Support in the Q&A section Udemy Certificate of Completion Ready for Download To make sure you find the information you are looking for the easiest, we have divided our Masterclass to 21 main sections:

item.title: Tai Chi Chen Style 38 Form -to Sharp Mind & Physical Fitness
item.description: In this courses, I will show you through breath control exercise and Tai Chi Skill to regain the peace of mind. Tai Chi Chen Style 38 Forms (陈式38式太极拳) combines the most of the postures from Chen Style Traditional 74 Forms, cut repeating movements. Comparing with Basic Tai Chi Chen Style 22 Forms and the commonly seen Tai Chi Yang Style, Tai Chi Chen Style 38 Forms keep the kicking, jumping and leaping movements which will apply in fighting.
